Module Breakout.Clone
Package Objects

Class Brick.Crack

java.lang.Object
Objects.Brick.Crack
Enclosing class:
Brick
public class Brick.Crack extends Object
Crack class to create cracks on the cement brick type when it is impacted by the ball

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Crack(int crackDepth, int steps)

    • jumps

      public int jumps(int bound, double probability)
      Returns random int to signify where crack will be if random number is greater than the jump probability or 0 otherwise
      Parameters:
      bound - the bounds of the brick
      probability - The jump probability
      Returns:
      random int to signify where crack will be if random number is greater than the jump probability or 0 otherwise
